titleStmt.title: Two sermons viz. 1. A preseruatiue lilie to cure soules. And 2. How to seeke to finde Christ. Preached by that famous and iudicious diuine, Peter Lilie, Doctor of Diuinitie, and sometime fellow of Iesus Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Lily, Peter, d. 1615.
Lily, Dorothy, d. 1627.

notesStmt.note: On Mark XVI, 16, and Luke XXIV, 5.
The name of the editor, Dorothy Lily, appears on A3r.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
